summary.description: A phylogenetic simulator of trees, genomes and sequences that accounts for dead linages | Evolution simulator with extinct lineages | Zombi: A phylogenetic simulator of trees, genomes and sequences that accounts for dead lineages | Zombi is a flexible platform of genome evolution which can be of great interest to those who want to test different evolutionary hypotheses under simulations and need to use a fast and easy-to-use tool to generate species trees, gene trees or sequences. Zombi's output is especially simple and easy to read, understand and parse
summary.name: Zombi
